vote.title: To amend the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget; to authorize and direct the City Auditor to appropriate and transfer funds from the Special Income Tax Fund to the Streets and Highways Bond Fund; to authorize the Director of Public Service to enter into contract with Kokosing Construction Company, Inc. for the Resurfacing 2023 Project 1 project; to authorize the expenditure of up to $9,764,509.37 from the Streets and Highways Bond Fund, and to declare an emergency. ($9,764,509.37)
vote.description: A motion was made by Lourdes Barroso De Padilla, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
